src:
Sejumlah Kapolsek di Polres Tasikmalaya Kota Diganti
04 Nov 2019, 14:03 by Bambang Arifianto
TASIKMALAYA, (PR).- Pergantian sejumlah Kapolsek terjadi di lingkungan Polres Tasikmalaya Kota, Senin 4 November 2019. Mutasi tersebut merupakan dinamika guna penyegaran di tubuh Korps Bhayangkara Kota Tasikmalaya. 
Upacara serah terima jabatan itu berlangsung di Lapangan Mapolres Tasikmalaya Kota, Jalan Letnan Harun, Senin pagi. Upacara Sertijab tersebut dipimpin komandan upacara Ipda Dadang Juanda selaku Kepala Unit Laka Lantas Satuan Lalu Lintas Polres Tasikmalaya Kota. ‎Dalam upacara tersebut diserahterimakan jabatan beberapa Kapolsek, yakni‎  Kapolsek Tawang dari Iptu Engkos Kosasih,SH, MH  kepada Iptu Yana Kusdiyana dan‎ Kapolsek Sukaresik dari Iptu Endang Wijaya, Ssos kepada Iptu Engkos Kosasih, SH, MH.
Tak hanya itu, kegiatan tersebut juga menggelar korp raport kenaikan pangkat pengabdian dari Aiptu menjadi Ipda yang diperoleh Ipda Tusimun, Kanit Binmas Polsek Sukaratu Polres Tasikmalaya Kota. Dalam amanatnya Kapolres Tasikmalaya Kota AKBP Anom Karibianto menyatakan serah terima jabatan merupakan hal biasa dalam penyegaran organisasi di kepolisian. Anom mengapresiasi kinerja para Kapolres lama dan menyampaika selamat kepada para penggantinya. 
Anom juga mengapresiasi kenaikan pangkat Tusimun yang kini menjadi Ipda.
"Semoga dapat memberikan motivasi kepadanya dan kepada seluruh anggota sekalian dalam melaksanakan tugas kepolisian menjadi lebih baik," ucapnya. Pada Jumat 1 November 2019, pergantian pejabat utama dan Kapolsek juga terjadi di Polres Tasikmalaya, Jumat (1/11/2019). Pergantian tersebut merupakan bentuk pembinaan karir di lingkungan Polres Tasikmalaya. 
Upacara serah terima jabatan tersebut berlangsung di Lapangan Hitam Mapolres Tasikmalaya, Jalan Raya Mangunreja No 1, Desa/ Kecamatan Mangunreja, Kabupaten Tasikmalaya, Jumat pagi. Jabatan yang mengalami pergantian itu adalah ‎Kepala Satuan Intelkam Polres Tasikmalaya dari AKP Yufrialdi kepada pejabat baru AKP Jonnaidi, ‎ Kasat Lantas Polres Tasikmalaya dari AKP Atik Suswanti, S.H kepada pejabat baru AKP I Kadek Vemil, SE,SIK,MH.
AKP Yufrialdi menjadi Panit Subdit 2 Dit Intelkam Polda Jabar sedangkan‎ AKP Atik Suswanti, SH. Menjadi Kasat Lantas Polres Sukabumi Kota.
Posisi Kapolsek juga mengalami pergantian. Sejumlah jabatan Kapolsek yang berganti tersebut yakni‎ Kapolsek Pancatengah dari AKP Jonnaidi kepada  Iptu Roni Hartono, SE,MH,‎ Kapolsek Parungponteng dari IPTU Pengki Rizwan kepada  Iptu Sunarto, SSos,‎ Kapolsek Tanjungjaya dari Iptu Ate Ruhiyatna, SH kepada Iptu Supian, SH. Upacara serah terima jabatan dipimpin Inspektur Upacara Kapolres Tasikmalaya AKBP Dony Eka Putra, S.IK. dihadiri Wakapolres Tasikmalaya Kompol Rikky Aries Setiawan, S.ST., M.H. 
Dalam amanatnya, Dony mengatakan, serah‎ terima jabatan di lingkungan Polri merupakan hal yang biasa dengan tujuan untuk menjamin dinamika manajemen organisasi serta dalam rangka promosi bagi pejabat yang bersangkutan.
"Diharapkan diperoleh kemantapan pengalaman jabatan yang beragam dalam menyongsong tantangan tugas yang lebih berat di masa mendatang di mana trend perkembangan situasi Kamtibmas semakin meningkat," kata Dony. ***

Baca Juga
text:
A number of police chiefs in Tasikmalaya City Police were replaced
Nov 04 2019, 14:03 by Bambang Arifianto
TASIKMALAYA, (PR) .- Substitution of a number of police chiefs occurred in the Tasikmalaya City Police Station on Monday 4 November 2019. The mutation was a dynamic for refreshment within the Tasikmalaya City Bhayangkara Corps.
The handover ceremony took place at the Tasikmalaya City Mapolres Field, Jalan Lt. Harun, Monday morning. The Sertijab ceremony was led by the ceremony commander of Ipda Dadang Juanda as the Head of the Traffic Unit of the Traffic Unit of the Tasikmalaya City Police Unit. The ceremony was handed over the positions of several police chiefs, namely the police chief of Tawang from Iptu Engkos Kosasih, SH, MH to Iptu Yana Kusdiyana and the police chief Sukaresik from Iptu Endang Wijaya, social security to Iptu Engkos Kosasih, SH, MH.
Not only that, the activity also held a report card corps for the promotion of service from Aiptu to Ipda obtained by Ipda Tusimun, Kanit Binmas of the Sukaratu Police Station, Tasikmalaya City Police. In his mandate, Chief of the Tasikmalaya City Police, AKBP Anom Karibianto, said that the handover of positions was normal in refreshing the organization in the police. Anom appreciated the performance of the old Kapolres and congratulated his successors.
Anom also appreciated Tusimun's promotion, which is now Ipda.
"Hopefully it can motivate him and all members in carrying out police duties to be better," he said. On Friday 1 November 2019, the change of main officials and the police chief also occurred at the Tasikmalaya Regional Police Station, Friday (11/01/2019). The changeover is a form of career coaching within the Tasikmalaya police station.
The handover ceremony took place at the Black Field of the Tasikmalaya Mapolres, Jalan Raya Mangunreja No. 1, Mangunreja Village / District, Tasikmalaya Regency, Friday morning. The position that experienced the change was the Chief of the Tasikmalaya Regional Police Intelligence Unit from AKP Yufrialdi to the new AKP Jonnaidi official, Kasat Lantas of the Tasikmalaya Regional Police from AKP Atik Suswanti, S.H to the new AKP I Kadek Vemil, SE, SIK, MH official.
Yufrialdi AKP became Sub-Directorate of Sub Directorate 2 Directorate of West Java Police Intelligence while AKP Atik Suswanti, SH. Become a Head of Sukabumi City Police Headquarters.
The police chief's position also changed. A number of the replaced Kapolsek positions were Pancatengah Kapolsek from AKP Jonnaidi to Iptu Roni Hartono, SE, MH, Parungponteng Kapolsek from IPTU Pengki Rizwan to Iptu Sunarto, SSos, Tanjungjaya Police Chief from Iptu Ate Ruhiyatna, SH to Iptu Supian, SH. The handover ceremony was led by the Inspector of the Tasikmalaya Police Chief AKBP Dony Eka Putra, S.IK. attended by Deputy Chief of Tasikmalaya Kompol Rikky Aries Setiawan, S.ST., M.H.
In his mandate, Dony said, the handover of positions within the National Police was a matter of course with the aim of ensuring the dynamics of organizational management and in the context of promotion for the officials concerned.
"It is hoped that the stability of experience in various positions is expected to meet the challenges of a tougher task in the future where the development trend of the Kamtibmas situation is increasing," Dony said. ***
